description: A complex dual-failure scenario, for which training was removed by the organization to save costs, leaves the crew unprepared and unable to diagnose the evolving situation.

telemetry_events.description: A flap jam occurs, but the asymmetry protection system also fails.

transcript.speaker: FO
transcript.dialogue: It just says 'slow'. Should we continue?

transcript.speaker: CPT
transcript.dialogue: I... I don't know. This isn't in the book. We were never trained for this scenario. Let's declare an emergency and hold.

narrative_report.investigation_notes: Airline training records show that dual-failure scenarios were removed from the recurrent simulator training syllabus 2 years prior to the incident.

context_data.weather: IMC (Instrument Meteorological Conditions), low clouds, rain.
context_data.flight_phase_details: Approach in challenging weather, high workload.
